wildrift.name: The Wildrift
wildrift.description: A rugged no-man’s land crawling with wild beasts and old ruins. Once fertile, now overrun, the Wildrift tempts adventurers with hidden loot and danger alike.

character.name: Han
character.backstory:
Once a warrior, now a wanderer, the monk walks the world seeking balance for every blow he once struck. He carries a single ember from his fallen temple — a flame he swore will never die until his heart truly finds peace.
GitHub: @the-real-han
Created via OpenQuests UI

3.message:
Welcome, Han the Monk, to The Timberkeep.
Let's conquer the world together!

worldLog.summary: The dawn broke upon a land of quiet contemplation. With a singular soul stirring, the world awoke to a day undisturbed by grand pronouncements or shifting landscapes. Peace settled, a gentle breath held before the unfolding of destiny.

pinewood_grove.summary: No significant events occurred in Pinewood Grove on Day 1. The grove remained undisturbed, with no notable occurrences to report.

goldforge_mine.summary: The day began with an increase in ore extraction, yielding a significant amount of gold. No clans were defeated, and no other notable events transpired at the Goldforge Mine.

harmony_fields.summary: Nothing of consequence occurred on Day 1 in Harmony Fields. The fields remained peaceful, and no significant events were recorded.

golden_plains.summary: No events transpired on the Golden Plains today.

twilight_pits.summary: No significant events occurred at the Twilight Pits today. The day was uneventful, with no battles, resource changes, or clan activity to report.

wildrift.summary: No significant events occurred at The Wildrift today. The clan remains unvanquished, and no resources were gained.

blue.name: The Timberkeep
blue.description: Timberkeep’s people dwell in forest clearings surrounded by towering pines. They’re builders and wardens—steady as the trunks that shield their homes.

red.name: The Emberwatch
red.description: The miners and smiths of Emberwatch live among glowing forges and dusty tunnels rich with gold. They trade sweat for fortune and see progress in every swing of their hammers.

purple.name: The Prismveil
purple.description: A gathering of traders and travelers who value balance over greed. Prismveil’s lands hold a little of everything—trees, farms, and gold for trade or craft.

yellow.name: The Sunherd
yellow.description: Peaceful and hearty, the Sunherd clan tends vast grazing fields where flocks roam freely. Food means life to them, and their bounty feeds all who stand beside them.

black.name: The Shardveil
black.description: A clan of wanderers drawn to fortune and mystery. Each sunrise brings them a different bounty—some days gold, others wood or food. Chaos is their ally.
